name: An Empty Way
description:
A very small story driven game about finding your way into nothing.

The jam version is the original game version created for Ludum Dare 45, i recommend you to play the Normal Version, but if you want to vote for the Ludum Dare page or just want to see how bad the game was compared to how bad it's now you can download it.

Controls:

Press [Up Arrow]  for up movement.
Press [Left Arrow] for left movement.
Press [Right Arrow]  for right movement.
Press [Down Arrow] for down movement.
Press [Z] for interactions.
Press [C] for inventory.
